sentences.en: A few fortunate families have built concrete homes with migrant money.
sentences.cn: 少数幸运的家庭靠着打工带回的钱已经盖起了新房.

sentences.en: As a special group, migrant workers move between cities and countryside.
sentences.cn: 农民工是一特殊群体, 他们多数流动于城市和农村之间.

sentences.en: But whatever their motives , migrant workers must earn before they can remit.
sentences.cn: 因为他们的汇款主要是用于扶养他们的家庭.

sentences.en: Certainly geothermometry will be used with greater facility in sub - soil exploration and in detecting migrant fluids.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定,地热测量法在地下勘探和测试运移流体方面更便于使用.

sentences.en: City residents complain that migrant workers have threatened to take already scarce urban jobs.
sentences.cn: 城市居民抱怨民工威胁着本来已很紧张的城市就业机会.

sentences.en: Figures relating to the country's migrant labour force are vague.
sentences.cn: 流动劳动力的相关统计数字模糊不清.

sentences.en: For most migrant workers, AIDS may seem remote and alien.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病在大多数农民工看来似乎遥远而陌生.

sentences.en: Latinos do assimilate, albeit more slowly than some other migrant groups.
sentences.cn: 而这两方面的统计数字将会继续变动.

sentences.en: Many cities deny migrant children access to public schools.
sentences.cn: 很多城市拒绝接受农民工子女进入公立学校读书.

sentences.en: Migrant birds shelter in the reeds.
Migrant workers are vulnerable to exploitation.
The area was an important resting place for many types of migrant birds.
sentences.cn: 这个地区是多种候鸟的重要栖息地。

sentences.en: The flight of migrant birds were being tracked by the scientists.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正在跟踪候鸟的迁徙.

sentences.en: The government divides asylum seekers into economic migrants and genuine refugees.
sentences.cn: 政府将寻求政治庇护的人划分为经济移民和真正的难民。

sentences.en: What does the new labour contract law mean for migrant workers?
sentences.cn: 新颁布的劳动合同法对农民工的意义何在?

sentences.en: Yet an anti - migrant attitude runs consistently through the mainstream of urbanization.
sentences.cn: 然而,反对农民工进城的态度一直贯穿于城市化主流进程之中.

words.tran_cn: 移动；随季节而移居；移往
候鸟；移居者；随季节迁移的民工

trans.tran_cn: 候鸟，移居者，移民，随季节迁移的工作者，迁移动物
trans.tran_en: someone who goes to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work
